summary: Comet NEOWISE was first spotted using a space telescope's survey data. Data science is a field that combines math, statistics, and computer skills to understand and analyze data. It helps us gain insights from large, complex datasets. Data scientists use programming and stats to find patterns and knowledge. This field is like a tool that brings together different methods to study and learn from information, especially with the rise of technology and lots of new data.
title: Data science
